title: plz dont ban me
body: from the last two games I keep getting kicked out of the game, now it wont even let me connect, keeps giving me the error saying I do not have internet connection when I try to reconnect to the game. I already did 20 mins of extended queue time. I am not leaving the games on purpose. I do not want to wait for another 20 mins per game. plz!

replies.body: If you've left more than one game in a short period of time, then your account could receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty regardless of intent.  It's not a ban but instead a lower priority queue to give you time to troubleshoot or otherwise prevent what may have been another leave.  It seems like an unstbale connection is causing you to get kicked off our game server.  Go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this!
great, even after making this post i was played under another 5 games of 20 mins queue time, thanks a lot riot!
that sucks :( i myself am stuck inside a game with just a giant 'reconnect' sign when the server went down... I can't even close it out or i'll get a leaver's penalty.
